entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.IFRS.0115.9565] The concept ifrs-full:InterestIncomeOnFinancialAssetsHeldForTrading with a period duration starting on 2018-12-31 and ending on 2019-09-30 or 273 days with a reported value of 204,023,000 has a value greater than the value of the same element with a longer or equivalent period duration that starts on 2018-12-31 and ends on 2019-12-31 with a value of 199,947,000. The value 204,023,000 for the period of 273 days should be less or the same as the value 199,947,000 with a duration of 365 days assuming that the concept ifrs-full:InterestIncomeOnFinancialAssetsHeldForTrading cannot have a negative value. The properties of this ifrs-full:InterestIncomeOnFinancialAssetsHeldForTrading fact are: Period :2019-01-01 to 2019-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : BRL
Rule Element Id:9565 Rule version: 15.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1787425/000119312520305583/xp-20200531.xml 11462

property.name: label
property.value: Interest income on financial assets held for trading
